H0.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Painkiller

H1.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Pain Reliever

H2.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Opiate

H3.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Algesic

A4.text: An analgesic drug is also called painkiller.

A5.text: An analgesic drug is also called pain reliever.

A6.text: An analgesic drug, also called simply an analgesic, antalgic, pain reliever, or painkiller, is any member of the group of drugs used for pain management.
